name: WhichHueAreYou
description:
For this week's Creative Code challenge by @sableRalph : Single Hue I decided to make a Choose your Own Hue Poetic Story using Twine.

What you see and hear are all derived from single hues. The question remains: Which Hue Are You?

With the audiovisual assets coded in SonicPi(Audio), Hydra(Visuals) and LivecodeLab(Visuals)

For More Information Check the Blog : https://blog.illestpreacha.com/wccchallenge-singlehue
